function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced carbon dioxide emissions from automobiles due to remote work and online mode","Impact":"Positive impact on the environment","Mitigation":"Encourage sustainable work-from-home practices, invest in renewable energy sources for remote work infrastructure","Technologies":"Remote work software, renewable energy technologies","People":"Workers, companies","Owner":"Companies, government"},{"Description":"Substantial reduction in greenhouse gas emissions and atmospheric constituents","Impact":"Positive impact on the environment","Mitigation":"Invest in renewable energy, promote sustainable transportation, reduce dependence on fossil fuels","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, electric vehicles, sustainable transportation infrastructure","People":"Global population, environmental organizations","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Substantial decrease in environmental emissions from remote meetings and events","Impact":"Positive impact on the environment","Mitigation":"Promote remote meeting technology, reduce unnecessary travel for events and and nitrogen dioxide in the atmosphere, increase in ozone concentration","Impact":"Environmental impact, respiratory health risks","Mitigation":"Control emissions from industrial activities, promote cleaner energy sources, monitor and regulate ozone levels","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, emission control technology, clean energy sources","People":"Local residents, industrial workers","Owner":"Government, industrial companies"},{"Description":"Restriction of day-to-day mobility impacting various sectors such as entertainment, tourism, and manufacturing","Impact":"Negative impact on the economy and employment","Mitigation":"Support affected industries, invest in alternative economic activities, provide financial aid to impacted workers","Technologies":"Economic stimulus
